predicate.note: Frames file for 'clutter' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 9.8.

example.name: adjectival
example.text: ``Now the field is less cluttered,'' he added.

example.name: verbal, agentive
example.text: After the confusion surrounding the change of the Coke formula in 1985, Coca-Cola was reluctant [*-1] to clutter the Classic name with a brand extension.

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: Cast-off clothing, half-read books, pizza crusts, and the occasional weapon of mass destruction clutter John's room.
example.arg: Cast-off clothing, half-read books, pizza crusts, and the occasional weapon of mass destruction
